title: Team_MegaPari
author: Team_MegaPari
content: Hey, hey! We're back with another exciting opportunity for profitable betting. It's time to put your knowledge to the test and claim a very good prize Be one of the lucky first 20 participants  to answer our question correctly, and you'll score an incredible 10 EUR free bet.Get in on the action now and let the winnings roll in!The question is:“Under which license regulator is the MegaPari gambling brand operating?” Terms and conditions: 1. Registered and non-registered players are welcome to take part. 2. Deposit at least 10 EUR to your MegaPari account to get the 10 EUR free bet.3. After you deposit a required amount, you should place an accumulator bet containing at least 3 sports events with odds of 1.4 or more. Then put your promo code in the bet slip section below. 4. You have 24 hours to place your accumulator bet and apply the promo code since your deposit. If this requirement is not fulfilled, you will need to make another deposit to activate your 10 EUR free bet. In other words, do not place other bets before you apply the free bet. 5. The promo code is valid until 02.06.2023.If you guys like the contest, we will be happy to conduct it each week!But be advised that in order to make it fair, users are welcome to get their 10 EUR free bet promo code once in two weeks.Any questions regarding the event?Feel free to ask on our ANN thread to keep this topic clean.

comments.author: Razu555
comments.body: is licensed and regulated by the Curacao Gaming Authority

comments.author: Team_MegaPari
comments.body: Quote from: Razu555 on May 03, 2023, 12:37:40 PMis licensed and regulated by the Curacao Gaming AuthorityGot it. Waiting for more answers!

comments.author: Razu555
comments.body: Since its launch, MegaPari has opened its platform to almost all European countries, including the Baltics Region, and is licensed and regulated by the Curacao Gaming Authority.

comments.body: Quote from: Razu555 on May 03, 2023, 02:53:16 PMSince its launch, MegaPari has opened its platform to almost all European countries, including the Baltics Region, and is licensed and regulated by the Curacao Gaming Authority.According to the conditions of the contest, we are waiting for more answers to reveal the promo codes and the right answer c:

comments.author: Team_MegaPari
comments.body: If you guys write the right answer, you will simply receive the 10 EUR free bet
